attributes.action: Esatblish Armistice day as a national public holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom has the fewest public holidays in Europe. Those public holidays are spread unevenly throughout the year. Intoducing Armistice day (11th November) as a public holiday would be an ideal opportunity to partially redress both of those issues while honouring and remembering those who sacrificed so much for our futures.
